verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:22
verses.text: For the Jews require a sign, and the Greeks seek after wisdom:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:23
verses.text: But we preach Christ crucified, unto the Jews a stumblingblock, and unto the Greeks foolishness;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:24
verses.text: But unto them which are called, both Jews and Greeks, Christ the power of God, and the wisdom of God.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:25
verses.text: Because the foolishness of God is wiser than men; and the weakness of God is stronger than men.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:26
verses.text: For ye see your calling, brethren, how that not many wise men after the flesh, not many mighty, not many noble, are called:
